paper_abstract: We prove that the sum of d small-bias generators L : F(s) -> F(n) fools degree-d polynomials in n variables over a field F, for any. fixed degree d and. field F, including F = F(2) = {0, 1}. Our result builds on, simplifies, and improves on both the work by Bogdanov and Viola (FOCS '07) and the follow-up by Lovett (STOC '08). The. first relies on a conjecture that turned out to be true only for some degrees and. fields, while the latter considers the sum of 2(d) small-bias generators (as opposed to d in our result).
paper_title: THE SUM OF D SMALL-BIAS GENERATORS FOOLS POLYNOMIALS OF DEGREE D
